item.title: Using Packer for Infrastructure as Code: Best Practices and Benefits
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Packer" , "Infrastructure as Code" , "DevOps" , "Automation" , "Security" , "Repeatability" , "Scalability" , "Multi-Platform" , "Version Control" , "Cloud Computing" , "Machine Images" , "Virtualization" , "Configuration Management" , "Continuous Integration" , "Continuous Delivery" , "Software Development" , "Best Practices" , "Testing" , "Open Source" , "Multi-Cloud"
item.description: Learn how to use Packer for creating machine images that are easy to maintain and secure.

item.title: Should You Learn Programming for IT and Cyber Security?
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "IT and Cyber Security" , "Programming Skills" , "Career Advancement" , "Automation" , "Command Line" , "Scripting" , "Infrastructure Deployment" , "Data Analysis" , "Security Testing" , "Professional Development"
item.description: Learn why mastering programming skills can greatly benefit your IT and Cyber Security career, and how to get started with PowerShell, Bash, Python, Ansible, Packer, and Terraform.
